hotels.title: El Nido Waterfront Hotel
hotels.content: El Nido Waterfront Hotel puts the best of El Nido at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.
hotels.location: Hama Street, El Nido, Palawan Island Philippines

hotels.title: El Nido Sea Shell Hotel
hotels.content: Designed by travelers, for travelers. This is the premier hostel at the heart of bustling El Nido town composed of Instagrammable interiors, rooms for steady relaxation.
hotels.location: Balinsasayaw Road cor. Calle Real, El Nido, Palawan Island 5313 Philippines

hotels.title: El Nido Sea Shell Hotel
hotels.content: We are El Nido Seashell Hotel, an up and coming luxury experience in the lucrative island destination known to most as El Nido, Palawan.
hotels.location: Rizal Street Corner Real Street Barangay Buena Suerte, El Nido, Palawan Island 5313 Philippines

hotels.title: Cuna Hotel
hotels.content: Set in El Nido within 8 km of Big Lagoon, Cuna Hotel features an outdoor swimming pool, a shared lounge, and a restaurant and bar on-site. At the hotel.
hotels.location: Osmeña Street, Barangay Masagana, Palawan, 5313 El Nido, Philippines

hotels.title: S Resort El Nido
hotels.content: S Resort El Nido is situated in El Nido, within 70 m of El Nido Beach and less than 1 km of Caalan Beach. The property is around 9.1 km from Big Lagoon El Nido.
hotels.location: Rizal Street, Palawan, 5313 El Nido, Philippines

hotels.title: Rosanna's Pension
hotels.content: Featuring free WiFi, Rosanna's Pension offers accommodation in El Nido. Rooms come with a TV. Some units have a seating area where you can relax.
hotels.location: Hama Street, Barangay Masagana, Palawan, 5313 El Nido, Philippines

hotels.title: South Anchorage Inn
hotels.content: Situated in El Nido and with El Nido Beach reachable within 100 metres, South Anchorage Inn features concierge services, non-smoking rooms, a shared lounge, free WiFi throughout the property and a terrace.

hotels.title: Sea Cocoon Hotel
hotels.content: Boasting an outdoor swimming pool, shared lounge and views of pool, Sea Cocoon Hotel is situated in El Nido, 100 m from El Nido Beach. The property is located 800 m from Caalan Beach.
hotels.location: Calle Real, Barangay Masagana, Palawan, 5313 El Nido, Philippines

hotels.title: Lagùn Hotel
hotels.content: Situated in El Nido, Lagùn Hotel features an outdoor swimming pool and a terrace. Located around 8 km from Big Lagoon El Nido, the hotel is also 8 km away from Small Lagoon El Nido.
hotels.location: Balinsasayaw Road, Barangay Maligaya, National Highway, Palawan, 5313 El Nido, Philippines

hotels.title: Maligaya Beach Bungalows
hotels.content: Situated on the beachfront in El Nido and boasting a garden, Maligaya Beach Bungalows has free WiFi throughout the property. The property is around a few steps from Corong Corong Beach.
hotels.location: Corong Corong Beach, Palawan, 5313 El Nido, Philippines

hotels.title: One El Nido Suite
hotels.content: Rooms are air-conditioned and equipped with a flat-screen TV, safety deposit box and wardrobe. Private bathrooms are fitted with a shower and bidet. For your comfort, you will find slippers, free toiletries and a hairdryer.
hotels.location: Lot 2, Barangay Corong-Corong, Palawan, 5313 El Nido, Philippines

hotels.title: Jai-cob’s Suites
hotels.content: Located in Coron, one kilometer from Dicanituan Beach, Jai-cob’s Suites has accommodations with a restaurant, free private parking, a garden and a terrace. Located around 5.3 km from Kayangan Lake, the hotel with free WiFi.
hotels.location: Real Street 12, Coron Town Proper, 5316 Coron, Philippines

hotels.title: Swiftlets Inn
hotels.content: Located in the Town Proper of El Nido, 8 km from Big Lagoon and 13 km from Matinloc Shrine, Swiftlets Inn features limestone views of Palawan. The rooms at the Swiftlets Inn are air-conditioned and has a private bathroom with free toiletries.
hotels.location: Rizal Street corner Balinsasayaw Road Maligaya, Palawan, 5313 El Nido, Philippines
